mapper.insert: insert into image(img_no, us_no, prd_no, can_no, rev_no, img_file, img_use, img_oname, img_type, pg_no) values(img_no_seq.nextval, #{us_no, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prd_no, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{can_no, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rev_no, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{img_file}, #{img_use}, #{img_oname}, #{img_type}, #{pg_no})
mapper.select: select * from image where pg_no=#{pg_no} and img_use='THM'
select * from image where pg_no=#{pg_no} and img_use='THM' order by prd_no, img_no ASC
select * from image where pg_no=#{pg_no} and ROWNUM=1 and img_use='THM' order by prd_no
select * from (select * from image where prd_no=#{prd_no} and img_use='THM' order by img_no ASC) where ROWNUM = 1
select * from image where prd_no=#{prd_no} and img_use='THM' order by img_no ASC
select * from image where pg_no=#{pg_no} and img_use='DET'
